summary: This mod is replace Odaviing with another dragon model and an altered behavior.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is replace Odaviing with another dragon model and an altered behavior(more aggressive than Odaviing). It's modeled from scratch,looks more organic,slightly bigger than the average dragon and comes with high resolution textures (2048X2048 mostly).

To install just extract the contents of the rar file into your Skyrim folder.For it to work You must check the esp file that comes with it in your launch menu.

The Mod has been showcased in several popular "mods of the week" video.You can check them below and see the BEHEMOTH from many angles and with different graphical settings.

[youtube]SrasXaxxh94[/youtube]

[youtube]DaZj8LbfE9E[/youtube]

[youtube]af6NATVU8jA[/youtube]

[youtube]LTZKjTAfXNs[/youtube]


Update

I added an optional file that remove its feathers to give him a more "traditional" look.It looks more organic now and might even gross out few people lol.You can check the pictures section to see it up close.
author: Zerofrost Satyr

files.name: No behavioral change and attacks  power increased FIX
